titleStmt.title: The glory and interest of nations professing the Gospel preached at a private fast, to the Commons assembled in Parliament / published by their command, by J. Owen.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, cropped, stained, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
